text: Peter Lichtner-Hoyer (28 December 1925 - 23 November 2020) was an Austrian sportsman and colonel. He was born in Graz, Austria. He competed during the 1956 Summer Olympics in show jumping and 1960 Summer Olympics in pentathlon. Lichtner-Hoyer was born in Graz and died on 23 November 2020 in Vienna at the age of 94.Peter Lichtner-Hoyer's obituary ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympians for Austria Category:Sportspeople from Graz
title: Peter Lichtner-Hoyer
